title: React Increment Decrement Counter
description: In this challenge you will be developing a counter game aka increment decrement counter using React hooks i.e with useState and useEffect in which you can click a button to increase the count value. This you can play with your friends and challenge them to click click click... as much as possible in a given time.

meta.title: Mastering React Increment Decrement Counter
meta.description: Dive into a captivating React tutorial that teaches you how to build an interactive increment decrement counter game.
